channel.title: [PI]Valacity 317[PI]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/val317.gif[/img]
[center][b][size=18pt]Introduction[/size][/b][/center]
Hello everyone, I am vexillum, you can call me vex for short. I am starting a new development called Valacity. Valacity is a 317 Project Insanity server. You may remember my old development called Vexillum.. It was a dspk and I now realise that dspk is a piece of shit (no offense to any dspk users out there) so I decided to start this new development that is a PI, but isn't a dspk. Now I know you all probably don't feel like reading this all but Valacity will be a good server, I can promise that to you. A lot of people probably say that, but I am dead fucking serious and anyone who doubts me can suck a dick. Feedback is appreciated so lets get on to the good stuff!
[center][b][size=18pt]Base: Project Insanity[/size][/b][/center] [center][b][size=18pt]Source: SeaScape (Thanks iz3 legend)[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]Current Team[/size][/b][/center]
[b]Me - Programmer/Hoster[/b] [b]Shadow - Programmer/Website Developer[/b]
[center][b][size=18pt]Currently Needed[/size][/b][/center]
Gfx Designer - 0/2 Video editor/maker - 0/2 Client developer(NEEDED BADLY) - 0/2 Advanced Programmer - 0/1 Programmers - 3/3 Advertiser - 0/3 Beta Tester - 0/5 Helper - 0/3 (No Java knowledge needed just be willing to help with the server and stay dedicated)
[center][b][size=18pt]Format[/size][/b][/center]
[code]Applying for?: Age: Years with Java: Why should we choose you?: Do you think you can get along with other staff?: How many hours a day are you usually on?: Will you stay dedicated?: MSN: Java knowledge?(1/10): Proof of any work?:[/code] I know this is a bit of an application to fill out, but we would like to get to know you before we just accept you. Better safe than sorry.
[b]Note: You CAN apply for more than one position![/b]
[center][b][size=18pt]Server Features[/size][/b][/center]
[b]24/7 Hosted[/b] [b]Reduced lag[/b] [b]Perfect switching[/b] [b]New teleport timer[/b] [b]No hardcoded shit (May add a few things if staff agrees)[/b] [b]Shops[/b] [b]4 Minigames to enjoy (atm)[/b] [b]All 4 GWD bosses (20 KC to enter)[/b] [b]King Black Dragon[/b] [b]Lots of pking areas[/b] [b]Perfect timers[/b] [b]100% Skillcape emotes[/b] [b]New hp bars[/b] [b]Dharoks isn't overpowered (hits like RS)[/b] [b]Slayer (Like any other PI)[/b] [b]Agility[/b] [b]Thieving stall timers[/b] [b]Nearly perfected mining with random gems[/b] [b]Woodcutting[/b] [b]Adding more features as the development team grows![/b]
[center][b][size=18pt]Future things to be added[/size][/b][/center]
[b]Donator benefits with Donor zone[/b] [b]Pk points (With protection)[/b] [b]Possibly dragon claws (If team agrees)[/b] [b]Better combat[/b] [b]Better pking[/b] [b]Better switching[/b] [b]Different barrows[/b] [b]Fishing/cooking/smithing/crafting/fletching/firemaking/runecrafting/herblore[/b] [b]Improved shops[/b] [b]Paid webhost (VERY soon)[/b] [b]Vps (VERY soon)[/b] [b]Playershare = Lots of players (VERY soon)[/b] [b]Improved forum (When team grows)[/b]
[center][b][size=18pt]Pictures[/size][/b][/center]
[IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/switching.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/zamorak.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/saradomin.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/bandos.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/armadyl.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/of7rte.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/woodcutting.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/thieving.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/smithing.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/mining.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/28bhbu1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/k6h48.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/teleport.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/kbd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/clanchat.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1096.photobucket.com/albums/g323/thebestofall11/Valacity%20317/pestcontrol.png[/img]
[b]More coming soon[/b]
[center][b][size=18pt]Credits[/size][/b][/center]
iz3 legend - The wonderful source (Used some of your pics hope you don't mind) Get Blitz - The epic banner Shadowspkin - Helping develop the server Web developer - Helping develop the server Sanity - For Project Insanity If I missed anyone please forgive me!
[center][b][size=18pt]Post feedback on what you think of this![/size][/b][/center]

Will you stay dedicated?:yes.

item.title: [PI]Valacity 317[PI]
item.dc:creator: @dclawed dclawed
item.description:
@dclawed wrote:

Hi I am applying for helper/advertiser/GFX designer. I am not pro at gfx im ok.I can make good logos all I need is the background colour,text and pictures. I can do everything else. I have been previous mod in 2 servers: Flawlscape left due to lack of players and Zepsity which shut down don`t know why. I am helpful by making guides, active, answering questions and can also make GFX logos etc. I am 13 been playing rsps for 2-3 years, also my e-mail is mbec2@hotmail.co.uk. PM me or something.

Thanks
-Dclawed-

Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Because i’m nice.
How many hours a day are you usually on?: Depends. If it’s the summer, 1hour+ for sure. If its school time, only if I don’t have test’s or Lots of hw
Will you stay dedicated?: Yeah. If it’s alive

item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“oldskoolpk, post:36, topic:404474”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=501515.msg3669297#msg3669297 date=1310801603]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=501515.msg3669288#msg3669288 date=1310801264]

[quote]no dtd? no header? no body??
l2html[/quote]

Notice the …
[/quote] isn’t a tag? by header i was referring to what you mean is

-

Not really; it still has shit ton of leaks/horrible methods/shit-packed code.

Stop hating son, like you are a “wanna be” coder, let’s see your work sir? stop coming on and troll when it’s being developed obvously, learn to read and look closely at the catergory “developement team” enuf said
[/quote]You honestly have no fucking clue who I am.

Why do people like you think Hyperion is so fucking hard? All the shit is the same, because it’s all Java.

I know it is, but PI is easier… Like I said before, I am not that great with Java… and I think I should learn more before I start with Hyperion, don’t you?
[/quote]You honestly won’t learn much/good programming techniques by studying/working with bad code.

Hmm, maybe, maybe not… Not really bad code, you said yourself they are both Java. PI is easier for me, so I will start with using PI.

Hmm let’s compare the knowledge between I vain I and you.
Your a grain of sand, and I vain I is the beach.

You should look at his profile before asking for his work?[/quote]

Your right, I Vain I is a better coder than him but he is not bad with Java, and neither is I Vain I… But I’m done with this for now because none of the people developing it with me are on half the time and I’ve been doing game battles on MW2 so fuck RSPS’s for awhile.
